title.narrative: Strengthening resilience in violence in North Kivu

description.narrative: Build resilience through improved self -reliance and the confidence of individuals and communities in their ability to prosper. This will be done by using their own influence on their local context, including protecting their rights, improving their income that they can reinvest, establishing relationships between producers and traders and increasing market access.
